components: admin.css - Full styling including distribution lists
Backend routes for email and DL management
features: ✅ Complete Admin.js component with all required state and handlers
✅ Complete CSS styling for all Distribution List components
✅ Email list table with distribution_list field
✅ Tab navigation between emails and distribution lists
✅ Modal system for creating/editing emails and DLs
✅ Email selection interface for DL assignment
✅ Responsive design for mobile and desktop
